Nick's Blog

Back in black... or green

10 October 2007

As Les has said, like so many others: I've been so busy ... No time to blog ... I promise that I will soon ... Will set time aside to do so ... blarg. I'd like to think that I will blog more often but with sooo much stuff going on, I doubt that things will pick up in the near future.

This is more of a "Hey! I'm alive!" post. There are a lot of things that I would like to blog about, some of them more important than others.

  • Vanessa turned one! The special event took place at Chuck E. Cheese and we had a great time. Sooner or later there will be another post on dadhood much like this one with an update on Vanessa.
  • Carolyn had her 20th birthday. There are a few pictures floating around of the event.
  • We've been busting ass to push the 2.0 release of Delicious. The preview is up and available, if you havn't seen it you should check it out and request an invite.
  • The mustang is finally out of the shop. It needs a paint job but it sure does purr like a kitten. Anyone interested? Its for sale.
  • Carolyn and I have both been 70 for a while, have our flying mounts and in general have been having a ton of fun on Medivh. We are both Kara keyed and several of the other members are as well. We are thinking about doing a social raid once a week to get things going. So far so good.
